Many local roads across the Marlborough region were severely damaged by a significant storm event. View the current status of local roads.

With the Ed Sheeran Concerts, Warbirds over Wanaka and other holiday traffic expect delays wherever you go across the South Island this Easter weekend. Allow plenty of time – plan ahead and make your journey part of the fun.
